TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidationResult extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示保證可用、合併的 ，包含任何使其變為可用的設定變更報告。

span.span: Represents a merged that is guaranteed to be viable, with a report of any settings that were changed to make it viable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果初始要求列印功能不支援的印表機，印表機驅動程式以產生基本的可行的票證解析所有衝突。If the initial asks for printing functionality that the printer does not support, the printer driver resolves all conflicts in order to produce a viable ticket. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何合併兩個列印票證時使用此類型的值。The following example shows how to use the values of this type while merging two print tickets. [!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]
